## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>, which is printed using YAML block notation.

A minidump stream containing textual data (typically, the contents of a /proc/&lt;pid&gt; file on linux).

Definition at line 205 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/objectyaml/minidumpyaml-h">MinidumpYAML.h</a>.
